website_summaries.verdict: An affordable white undermount sink that will still be fashionable and functional years down the road.
cons: Cannot remove company logo from sink

customer_reviews.title: Though it’s high quality, I HATE that the American Standard Logo is printed large and prominently right under the faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the color to match the toilet. But would not have bought it if they had shown the logo printed on the sink in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Chica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink in a medium size.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time with no damage. It was adequately packaged. The sink is made of a long lasting, stain resistant porcelain-the strongest ceramic material sinks come in. The glaze is perfect with no defects. The color is a nice bright white unlike the other major brands. It will not match other major brand fixtures. This should fit any vanity. However, the picture is incorrect. The overflow cannot be seen when the sink is installed. The description is correct but the photo is not. I recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: icnony

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and was packed very well!! The only qualms I have is that there is a 1.5" x .5" bubbled American Standard logo fixed onto the sink directly below where the faucet would be (it cannot be removed). This is was not pictured nor mentioned in anyones comment so I figured I would notify others. It was so cheap and I'm happy with the quality of the rest of the sink that I'm just going to live with it and hope there are no issues with install!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Langan

customer_reviews.title: NOTE: "American Standard" logo imprinted
customer_reviews.text: The image doesn't show the logo that cannot be removed. Hate that!
customer_reviews.author: OtisPaul

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice fit, wish it was a little more finished around the top edge tho
customer_reviews.author: jospeh yunck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small bathroom vanity
customer_reviews.text: Installed this beautiful sink in a small vanity in order to maximize counter space. It is small but perfect for this application. I love the color which coordinates beautifully with travertine tile and granite counters. Also bought the American Standard Champion Elongated 1.6 gal toilet in the same color which coordinates very nicely and is a fabulous toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Holton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality You only downside is I ordered two on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality You only downside is I ordered two on the same day and I only got one and the next one is about three weeks away estimated arrival puts my remodel back but worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; good value
customer_reviews.text: American Standard has a reputation for quality plumbing products so I purchased this item for a bathroom remodeling project. It is a traditional style and comes in 3 different sizes so beware. This is the middle size which is standard. I mistakenly purchased the smaller one first but had to return it. Installed, it looks beautiful with an upscale look.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Figueiredo

customer_reviews.title: The product was delivered as promised. Well packaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as promised. Well packaged. The only thing it was smaller than I thought, but it was my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Tomoco Avila

customer_reviews.title: Small sink
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and received promptly. Does the job a sink is supposed to do. Did fit the need for a small sink in a travel trailer bathroom. It looks and feels like a sink should. "It's a sink".
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Small But Perfrect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to maximize my countertop with a small undermount. These really look great under my Tropical Brown granite slab.
customer_reviews.author: Kleinlt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping, item is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Classic American Standard Product
customer_reviews.text: Its is classic, high quality American design made by Mexican craftsmen. It's smaller size fits well in the Powder Room where it will be located.
customer_reviews.author: MM, Tucson, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and looks awesome in the new granite counter.
customer_reviews.author: Bette M.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: since i only have 60 inch double vanity sink table, this basin fits perfectly. they look very simple but cute.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Need a new sink?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Safely, it is a bit on the small side but that is what the granite was cut for. all in all a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: kelly Cook

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems like it is a bit small for my counter top
customer_reviews.author: mattz

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink
customer_reviews.text: A sink is a sink is a sink... This one is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: beagelover

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ones
customer_reviews.text: Can't write the seller any other way. I ordered two of these, but they are under mounts, and I need vessel sinks. Would like to return both items and get a refund posted to my original payment method.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect sink basin for a wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sink basin for a wonderful price. I saw twice the price for much lesser quality in my local shops. Great service Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. James M. Lowry

product_meta.title: American Standard 0495.221.020 Ovalyn 17-Inch Basin Undercounter Bathroom Sink, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteStyle that's sized to fit. This versatile, oval undercounter sink is available in three sizes to accommodate a variety of applications. Not only does it free up valuable counter space, it's also the easiest type of sink to keep clean. Made from high-gloss, stain-resistant Vitreous China. For use with a deck- or wall-mount faucet.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The American Standard Ovalyn Vitreous China Undercounter Sink is a classic oval undermount sink with front overflow. It is designed with an unglazed rim for undercounter installation. It comes supplied with a cut out template and mounting kit. Sink Dimensions: 17-1/8" x 14-1/8" and Bowl Sizes: 15-1/8" wide x 12-1/8" front-to-back x 5-1/2" deep.
feature_bullets: Supplied with undercounter mounting kit and template
